How to Use

Complete guide to using the JESUS IS KING secure messaging platform safely and effectively. Learn about features, security practices, and getting started.

Getting Started

1

Download & Verify

Download the application and verify signatures to ensure authenticity.

2

Install Securely

Install on a secure system, preferably Tails OS or a hardened environment.

3

Initial Setup

Create your identity, generate keys, and configure security settings.

4

Connect Safely

Exchange keys out-of-band and establish secure communication channels.

Key Features

End-to-End Encryption

Messages encrypted with Signal protocol for maximum security.

Identity Management

Secure identity creation and verification with hardware token support.

Group Messaging

Secure group communications with perfect forward secrecy.

Scripture Integration

Built-in access to Scripture for study and inspiration.

Security Best Practices

Before Using

  • • Verify download signatures
  • • Use Tails OS or secure environment
  • • Disable swap and enable memory locking
  • • Use hardware kill switches
  • • Disconnect unnecessary peripherals

During Use

  • • Exchange keys out-of-band
  • • Verify recipient fingerprints
  • • Use hardware tokens when possible
  • • Regularly update software
  • • Follow operational security practices

Common Issues & Solutions

Connection Failed

Check Tor connectivity and firewall settings. Ensure onion addresses are correct.

Key Verification Failed

Re-exchange keys out-of-band. Verify fingerprints match exactly.

Hardware Token Not Detected

Check USB connection, install drivers, and verify token compatibility.

Message Decryption Failed

Verify sender identity and check for corrupted messages or key mismatches.

Technical Overview

Encryption

  • • Signal Protocol for end-to-end encryption
  • • Ed25519 for digital signatures
  • • X25519 for key exchange
  • • ChaCha20-Poly1305 for symmetric encryption
  • • Argon2id for key derivation

Infrastructure

  • • Tor hidden services for anonymity
  • • Ephemeral messaging (no permanent storage)
  • • Perfect forward secrecy
  • • Hardware security module support
  • • Cross-platform compatibility

Walk in Wisdom

"If any of you lacks wisdom, you should ask God, who gives generously to all without finding fault, and it will be given to you."

James 1:5

Seek God's wisdom in all your communications. Use these tools responsibly and let your digital interactions reflect Christ's love and truth.
